import { useState } from "react"; import { Link, useParams } from "react-router-dom"; function PaymentForm({ onPlaceOrder, selectedItems, selectedProduct }) { const [name, setName] = useState(""); const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); const [phone, setPhone] = useState(""); const [address, setAddress] = useState(""); const [cardNumber, setCardNumber] = useState(""); const [cardName, setCardName] = useState(""); const [dateExpired, setDateExpired] = useState(""); const [cvc, setCvc] = useState(""); const [paymentOption, setPaymentOption] = useState("credit"); const { id, quantity } = useParams(); const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const orderDetails = { name, email, phone, address, paymentOption, items: selectedItems ? selectedItems : selectedProduct, }; onPlaceOrder(orderDetails); }; return (
